function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor indoor air quality (IAQ) impacting health","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory illnesses and sick building syndrome","Mitigation":"Implementation of proper ventilation systems and regular maintenance of air quality","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, air quality sensors, HVAC systems","People":"Inhabitants, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of flexibility in hospital design","Impact":"Inability to adapt to emergency administration and changing requirements","Mitigation":"Incorporation of flexible design elements and operational solutions","Technologies":"Modular construction, adaptable room layouts, flexible infrastructure","People":"Hospital administrators, architects, designers","Owner":"Hospital management, architects, construction companies"},{"Description":"Lack of collaboration in studying and addressing COVID-19 epidemic","Impact":"Limited understanding and ineffective response to the epidemic","Mitigation":"Interdisciplinary collaboration among healthcare professionals, researchers, and policy makers","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, data analytics for public health, communication tools","People":"Healthcare professionals, researchers, policy makers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government authorities"}]}
